name: SearchTeamMembers
description:
Retrieve a filtered list of team members for a business.

This tool retrieves a paginated list of `TeamMember` objects associated with a business. It allows filtering by location IDs, status (`ACTIVE` or `INACTIVE`), or whether the team member is the Square account owner. Use this to manage or view team member details based on specific criteria.

parameters.name: filter_by_location_ids
parameters.description: Filter team members by specified location IDs. If empty, includes all locations.

value_schema.description:
When present, filters by team members assigned to the specified locations.
When empty, includes team members assigned to any location.

parameters.name: team_member_status
parameters.description: Filter team members by their status: 'ACTIVE' or 'INACTIVE'.

value_schema.description: Enumerates the possible statuses the team member can have within a business.

parameters.name: maximum_team_members_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of team members to return per page, default is 100.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of `TeamMember` objects in a page (100 by default).

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: The cursor used to retrieve the next page of results in a paginated list.

value_schema.description:
The opaque cursor for fetching the next page. For more information, see
[pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/working-with-apis/pagination).

parameters.name: return_account_owner_only
parameters.description: Set to true to return only the team member who is the Square account owner.

value_schema.description: When present and set to true, returns the team member who is the owner of the Square account.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: query.filter.location_ids
parameters.description:
When present, filters by team members assigned to the specified locations.
When empty, includes team members assigned to any location.

value_schema.description:
When present, filters by team members assigned to the specified locations.
When empty, includes team members assigned to any location.

parameters.name: query.filter.status
parameters.description: Enumerates the possible statuses the team member can have within a business.

value_schema.description: Enumerates the possible statuses the team member can have within a business.

parameters.name: query.filter.is_owner
parameters.description: When present and set to true, returns the team member who is the owner of the Square account.

value_schema.description: When present and set to true, returns the team member who is the owner of the Square account.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of `TeamMember` objects in a page (100 by default).

value_schema.description: The maximum number of `TeamMember` objects in a page (100 by default).

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description:
The opaque cursor for fetching the next page. For more information, see
[pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/working-with-apis/pagination).

value_schema.description:
The opaque cursor for fetching the next page. For more information, see
[pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/working-with-apis/pagination).

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
